title: attitude se shaadi tak
content:
PES ke gate pe tujhe pehli baar dekha tha,
Tabhi se dil ne tujhe apna samjha tha.
Classroom mein tu notes likhti thi,
Aur main sochta tha, "Shaadi ke card ka design kaisa hoga?"
Abhi tu attitude dikhati hai,
Par shaadi ke baad, meri jaan,
Tere haathon se khana khate hue,
Woh pyaar hoga, jo sab kuch bhula dega.‚ù§Ô∏è

Tbh I am proud to be in the same college as such a literary genius.

Chill. There is no need to start a language war here. This sub does not have a language restriction, and we do not intend to keep one. If you do not understand a post because it is in a different language, scroll past it. Although we'd prefer people to post in English for the sake of everyone, they are free to post in Hindi and any other language. No need to call out people for it.
